intents.description: Analyze NPS by region to understand regional satisfaction differences
Compare overall satisfaction across subscription plans to identify which plan types have higher satisfaction levels
Analyze correlation between feature usage and overall satisfaction to determine which features drive satisfaction
Segment customers by tenure and analyze NPS to understand loyalty differences between long-term and new customers
Identify at-risk customers with low NPS and low purchase intent to assess retention risks

rationale: The analysis plan aims to provide actionable insights into customer satisfaction, feature usage, and retention risks, which are crucial for enhancing product offerings and customer experience. By understanding satisfaction levels across different segments, we can identify areas for improvement and prioritize efforts to boost customer loyalty and retention. This will support strategic decisions for product development and marketing initiatives.

suggested_segments.name: Promoters
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are highly likely to recommend (NPS 9-10)

suggested_segments.name: Detractors
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who are unlikely to recommend (NPS 0-6)

suggested_segments.name: Free/Basic Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers on Free or Basic plans

suggested_segments.name: New Customers
suggested_segments.notes: Customers with tenure less than 6 months

suggested_segments.name: Feature Users
suggested_segments.notes: Customers who have used any features

suggested_segments.name: Low Purchase Intent
suggested_segments.notes: Customers unlikely to purchase again (Purchase Intent 1-2)
